sources.title: A Bay of Blood (1971) Horror, Mystery | Claudine Auger, Luigi Pistilli | Full Movie
sources.description:
The murder of a wealthy countess triggers a chain reaction of brutal killings in the surrounding bay area, as several unscrupulous characters try to seize her large estate.

Original title: Ecologia del delitto (1971)

Watch the uncensored version: https://youtu.be/2uKxDbUdrMQ


This film is available with subtitles in many languages.

Director: Mario Bava
Writers: Mario Bava, Giuseppe Zaccariello, Filippo Ottoni
Stars: Claudine Auger, Luigi Pistilli, Claudio Camaso
Genres: Horror, Mystery, Thriller


00:00 Full Movie
07:10 A mysterious conversation about a creature and a plan to meet at the bay unfolds, leading to unexpected twists and turns.
13:13 A group of people discuss the aftermath of a death, plans for inheritance, and a visit to a nightclub.
17:20 A chaotic and dramatic scene unfolds at a bay, involving love, betrayal, and danger.
24:07 Murder, mystery, and deception unfold as a group of people navigate through a complex web of events and relationships.
41:53 A discussion about a family's secrets, including a hidden son, unfolds near a bay.
46:49 Murder, deception, and a search for a legacy unfold in a suspenseful plot at a bay.
58:44 A summary of a horror mystery movie involving a murder, betrayal, and manipulation over a bay property.
1:04:55 Betrayal, manipulation, and murder unfold as a plan to acquire a bay leads to deadly consequences.
1:09:11 A series of events unfold as characters plan to dispose of a body and inherit a legal property.

sources.title: A Bay Of Blood 1971
sources.description: The murder of a wealthy countess triggers a chain reaction of brutal killings in the surrounding bay area, as several unscrupulous characters try to seize her large estate.

metadata.Plot: An elderly heiress is killed by her husband who wants control of her fortunes. What ensues is an all-out murder spree as relatives and friends attempt to reduce the inheritance playing field, complicated by some teenagers who decide to camp out in a dilapidated building on the estate.
metadata.Writer: Mario Bava, Giuseppe Zaccariello, Filippo Ottoni
metadata.Actors: Claudine Auger, Luigi Pistilli, Claudio Camaso
